Class Sinusoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • Sinusoid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Sinusoid
extends Shape
    FINISH THIS... Class to represent and define how a sinusoid is drawn
    Version:
    April 11, 2019
    Author:
    MoSho, _______________

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int amplitude
      Height of the sinusoid
      private int duration
      The number of complete periods to draw for the sinusoid
      private int frequency
      Frequency of the sinusoid in Hz (number of cycles in one period)
      static int samplerate
      Number of pixels within one cycle relative to the frequency

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sinusoid(java.awt.Color color, java.awt.Point start, int length, int freq, int height)
      Creates a sinusoid curve General formula: y = a * sin(2*PI*freq * t) Helpful links: http://hyperphysics.phy-astr.gsu.edu/hbase/Waves/funhar.html https://www.ck12.org/book/CK-12-Precalculus-Concepts/section/5.5/

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sinusoid

        public Sinusoid(java.awt.Color color,
                java.awt.Point start,
                int length,
                int freq,
                int height)
        Creates a sinusoid curve General formula: y = a * sin(2*PI*freq * t) Helpful links: http://hyperphysics.phy-astr.gsu.edu/hbase/Waves/funhar.html https://www.ck12.org/book/CK-12-Precalculus-Concepts/section/5.5/
        Parameters:
        color - Color for the curve
        start - Position in the image to start the curve
        length - The number of periods to draw for the curve (Notes: 1 period = 2*PI / freq)
        freq - The number of cycles per single period (Notes: freq = 2*PI / period)
        height - The amplitude of the curve

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
        Description copied from interface: Drawable
        This method defines how to draw the object.
        Parameters:
        graphics - A graphics object used for drawing.
